3: This looks like the ruins of some form of civilization.
Please proceed carefully. The digging devices are quite high-powered and might cause mini tremors.
There are some ruins up ahead.
We'll have to pass through it. The target's deep inside somewhere.
If we engage with any Corrupted, Bianca and I will be the ones to deal with them. The weathered structure of the ruins might not hold for our entire squad.
I know what to do. You don't need to remind me.

2: She didn't mean it that way, Karen.

3: I don't know you that well for you to call me that!
The ceiling is collapsing! Commandant, watch out!
It's trying to bury us alive.
